title: Best
review: I think it has some redeeming qualities.The first half with the losers club is not bad. It's just very difficult to adapt Kings work. He always has strange concepts that he can write and explain very well, but having to adapt it visually without his talent for details can lead to really bizarre and strange moments. I got the impression the mini series was showing you the different events and scares from the book without really knowing how they connect to each other. So a lot of it is taken out of context, which makes it a little awkward to watch.
